languages.text: {n}Сервитор заметно отличается от тех, к которым привыкли вы. Медная нить прошивает кожные покровы, суставы заменены металлическими шарнирами — кажется, создателями Стража было сделано все, чтобы результат их труда служил значительно дольше, чем обычные рабочие машины.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сервитор заметно отличается от тех, к которым привыкли вы. Медная нить прошивает кожные покровы, суставы заменены металлическими шарнирами — кажется, создателями Стража было сделано все, чтобы результат их труда служил значительно дольше, чем обычные рабочие машины.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The servitor looks noticeably different from the ones you are used to. Its skin covering is stitched together with copper thread, and it has metal hinges in place of the standard joints — it seems that the creators of the Sentinel did everything to ensure that the service life of this unit would be much longer than that of ordinary automatons.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сервитор заметно отличается от тех, к которым привыкли вы. Медная нить прошивает кожные покровы, суставы заменены металлическими шарнирами — кажется, создателями Стража было сделано все, чтобы результат их труда служил значительно дольше, чем обычные рабочие машины.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Usually one can tell by looking at a servitor that they were made from a human body, but this one seems to be entirely metallic. This thick shell likely conceals bones wrapped in the remnants of musculature — the unseen frame that allows the Sentinel to move.{/n}

{n}Usually one can tell by looking at a servitor that they were made from a human body, but this one seems to be entirely metallic. This thick shell likely conceals bones wrapped in the remnants of musculature — the unseen frame that allows the Sentinel to move.{/n}

{n}One can usually tell by looking at a servitor that it was made from a human body, but this one seems to be entirely metallic. Its thick shell likely conceals bones wrapped in the remnants of musculature — the unseen frame that allows the Sentinel to move.{/n}

{n}One can usually tell by looking at a servitor that it was made from a human body, but this one seems to be entirely metallic. Its thick shell likely conceals bones wrapped in the remnants of musculature — the unseen frame that allows the Sentinel to move.{/n}

{n}The servitor looks noticeably different from the ones you're used to. Copper thread stitches its skin, the joints are replaced by metal hinges — it seems that the creators of the Sentinel did everything so that the result of their work would serve much longer than ordinary working automatons.{/n}

{n}The servitor looks noticeably different from the ones you are used to. Its skin covering is stitched together with copper thread, and it has metal hinges in place of the standard joints — it seems that the creators of the Sentinel did everything to ensure that the service life of this unit would be much longer than that of ordinary automatons.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个机仆与那些司空见惯的机仆截然不同。它的皮肤覆层是用铜线缝制的，标准的关节也由金属铰链取代。看来，这个哨兵的制造者尽其所能，确保这台装置的使用寿命比普通的自动装置长很多。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks noticeably different from the ones you are used to. Its skin covering is stitched together with copper thread, and it has metal hinges in place of the standard joints — it seems that the creators of the Sentinel did everything to ensure that the service life of this unit would be much longer than that of ordinary automatons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个奴工与那些司空见惯的奴工截然不同。它的皮肤覆层是用铜线缝制的，标准的关节也由金属铰链取代。看来，这个哨兵的制造者尽其所能，确保这台装置的使用寿命比普通的自动装置长很多。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El servidor tiene un aspecto muy distinto al que estás acostumbrad{mf|o|a} a ver. Su exterior cutáneo está cosido con hilo de cobre y cuenta con bisagras de metal en lugar de las articulaciones habituales, lo que indica que sus creadores hicieron todo lo posible por extender la vida útil de esta unidad mucho más de lo normal para los autómatas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks noticeably different from the ones you are used to. Its skin covering is stitched together with copper thread, and it has metal hinges in place of the standard joints — it seems that the creators of the Sentinel did everything to ensure that the service life of this unit would be much longer than that of ordinary automatons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor tiene un aspecto muy distinto al que estás acostumbrad{mf|o|a} a ver. Su exterior cutáneo está cosido con hilo de cobre y cuenta con bisagras de metal en lugar de las articulaciones habituales, lo que indica que sus creadores hicieron todo lo posible por extender la vida útil de esta unidad mucho más de lo normal para los autómatas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}このサーヴィターは、あなたがこれまでに見たサーヴィターとは明らかに違って見える。皮膚は銅糸で縫い合わされ、標準的な関節の代わりに金属製のヒンジが取り付けられている。センチネルの作成者は、このユニットの耐用年数が通常のオートマトンよりもはるかに長くなるようにあらゆる手段を講じたようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks noticeably different from the ones you are used to. Its skin covering is stitched together with copper thread, and it has metal hinges in place of the standard joints — it seems that the creators of the Sentinel did everything to ensure that the service life of this unit would be much longer than that of ordinary automatons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}このサーヴィターは、あなたがこれまでに見たサーヴィターとは明らかに違って見える。皮膚は銅糸で縫い合わされ、標準的な関節の代わりに金属製のヒンジが取り付けられている。センチネルの作成者は、このユニットの耐用年数が通常のオートマトンよりもはるかに長くなるようにあらゆる手段を講じたようだ。{/n}
{n}このサーヴィターは、あなたがこれまでに見たサーヴィターとは明らかに違って見える。皮膚は銅糸で縫い合わされ、標準的な関節の代わりに金属製のヒンジが取り付けられている。センチネルの作成者は、このユニットの耐用年数が通常のオートマトンよりもはるかに長くなるようにあらゆる手段を講じたようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le servitor est clairement différent de ceux que vous côtoyez au quotidien. La peau qui le recouvre est cousue au fil de cuivre et ses articulations ont été remplacées par des charnières en métal. Il semblerait que les créateurs de la sentinelle aient redoublé d'efforts pour offrir à cette unité une durée de vie plus longue que celle des automates ordinaires.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks noticeably different from the ones you are used to. Its skin covering is stitched together with copper thread, and it has metal hinges in place of the standard joints — it seems that the creators of the Sentinel did everything to ensure that the service life of this unit would be much longer than that of ordinary automatons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor est clairement différent de ceux que vous côtoyez au quotidien. La peau qui le recouvre est cousue au fil de cuivre et ses articulations ont été remplacées par des charnières en métal. Il semblerait que les créateurs de la sentinelle aient redoublé d'efforts pour offrir à cette unité une durée de vie plus longue que celle des automates ordinaires.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor sieht deutlich anders aus als die normalen, die du kennst. Sein Hautüberzug ist mit Kupferdraht vernäht, und statt gewöhnlicher Gelenke verfügt er über Metallscharniere – anscheinend wollten seine Schöpfer unbedingt dafür sorgen, dass die Betriebsdauer dieser Einheit viel länger währte als die normaler Automaten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks noticeably different from the ones you are used to. Its skin covering is stitched together with copper thread, and it has metal hinges in place of the standard joints — it seems that the creators of the Sentinel did everything to ensure that the service life of this unit would be much longer than that of ordinary automatons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor sieht deutlich anders aus als die normalen, die du kennst. Sein Hautüberzug ist mit Kupferdraht vernäht, und statt gewöhnlicher Gelenke verfügt er über Metallscharniere – anscheinend wollten seine Schöpfer unbedingt dafür sorgen, dass die Betriebsdauer dieser Einheit viel länger währte als die normaler Automaten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu hizmetör, alışkın olduğun diğerlerinden göze çarpar biçimde farklı duruyor. Üzerini kaplayan deri, bakırdan bir telle dikilip birleştirilmiş ve sıradan eklemlerin yerine metal menteşeler konmuş. Bu Nöbetçi'nin yaratıcıları, bu birimin ömrünün sıradan otomatonlardan çok daha uzun olmasını sağlamak için ellerinden geleni yapmış gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor looks noticeably different from the ones you are used to. Its skin covering is stitched together with copper thread, and it has metal hinges in place of the standard joints — it seems that the creators of the Sentinel did everything to ensure that the service life of this unit would be much longer than that of ordinary automatons.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu servitör, alışkın olduğun diğerlerinden göze çarpar biçimde farklı duruyor. Üzerini kaplayan deri, bakırdan bir telle dikilip birleştirilmiş ve sıradan eklemlerin yerine metal menteşeler konmuş. Bu Nöbetçi'nin yaratıcıları, bu birimin ömrünün sıradan otomatonlardan çok daha uzun olmasını sağlamak için ellerinden geleni yapmış gibi duruyor.{/n}
